hero.headline: Quality, Construction, Architecture,  Perfection.

about.title: About the Company
about.subtitle: Led by Adi and Shira, A&S UZAN GROUP combines engineering precision, architectural excellence, and international experience to deliver world-class results.
about.adiBio: Born in 1997, Adi is a Civil Engineering graduate with over 10 years of hands-on experience in the construction industry. He has worked with leading companies, managing diverse projects from residential buildings to large-scale infrastructure. Adi specializes in site management, safety supervision, and integrating innovative construction methods. Passionate about architecture and engineering from a young age, he is committed to delivering projects with reliability, precision, and international standards.
about.shiraBio: Shira Uzan is a licensed architect with over a decade of experience in residential and commercial design. She specializes in creating innovative spaces that blend functionality with aesthetic excellence. Her approach emphasizes sustainable design principles and client collaboration, ensuring each project reflects the unique vision and needs of those who will inhabit the space.
about.visionText: To set new standards in construction and architecture — through trust, innovation, and a relentless pursuit of perfection.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This website (https://uzangroups.com) is operated by A&S UZAN GROUP CO., LTD ('the Company', 'we', 'our'). We are dedicated to safeguarding your personal data in compliance with Thailand’s Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) and global privacy standards.

1.title: 1. Data Collection
content: We may collect personal details such as full name, phone number, email, and messages submitted through contact forms.
Technical data such as IP address, device type, browser, and cookies may also be collected for analytics and optimization.

2.title: 2. Purpose of Data Use
content: To operate, improve, and secure our website; respond to inquiries; provide services; share updates (with consent); and comply with legal obligations.
All data processing is handled lawfully, transparently, and securely under the PDPA.

3.title: 3. Data Retention
content: Your data is securely stored in Thailand or in jurisdictions offering equivalent data protection standards.
We maintain strong security measures including encryption, controlled access, and regular backups.

4.title: 4. Sharing Data with Third Parties
content: We may share information with service providers (hosting, maintenance, security, analytics) under strict confidentiality obligations.
Data may also be disclosed when legally required or upon court order.

5.title: 5. Your Rights
content: Under Thailand’s PDPA, you have the right to access, correct, delete, object to processing, and request data portability.
For inquiries or requests, please contact: info@uzangroups.com

6.title: 6. Company Information
content: Address: 2 Soi Phueng Mi 7/2, Bang Chak Subdistrict, Phra Khanong District, Bangkok 10260, Thailand
For inquiries or requests, please contact: info@uzangroups.com

architecture.title: Architecture That Tells a Story
architecture.intro: Shira, our chief architect, creates spaces that live and breathe. Every project is a journey — from initial vision to a creation that transforms spatial experience.
architecture.shiraBio: Shira Uzan is a licensed architect with over a decade of experience in residential and commercial design. She specializes in creating innovative spaces that blend functionality with aesthetic excellence. Her approach emphasizes sustainable design principles and client collaboration, ensuring each project reflects the unique vision and needs of those who will inhabit the space.

design.title: Architecture & Design That Inspires
design.desc: We don't just design buildings — we create experiences. Every line, every corner, every light — designed with surgical precision to create something that feels just right.

construction.title: From Vision to Reality – Flawless Execution
construction.desc: Renovations? It's not just work. It's an art of precision, attention, and love for details. We take old spaces and turn them into something breathtaking.

architecture.cta: Have a Vision? Let's Bring It to Life Together

isolation.title: Professional Thermal Insulation Installation
isolation.subtitle: Energy-Efficient Solutions for Your Home & Business
isolation.description: Expert installation of premium reflective insulation materials designed to reduce heat transfer, lower energy costs, and maintain comfortable indoor temperatures year-round. Our certified technicians ensure precise installation for maximum thermal performance in residential and commercial properties.
